title: Marc Fosh's mango sorbet recipe
description:
Marc Fosh's tip

Dip the serving spoon into hot water so it glides effortlessly through the sorbet, giving you a beautiful round shape for serving.

This recipe was prepared with the Braun Multiquick 7 Cordless hand blender and with its large chopper accessory.

asset.title: Marc Fosh's mango sorbet recipe
asset.description:
http://braun.com/global/household/recipes-and-household-tips/recipes-and-cooking-tips/dessert/mango-sorbet.html

Marc Fosh's tip

Dip the serving spoon into hot water so it glides effortlessly through the sorbet, giving you a beautiful round shape for serving.

This recipe was prepared with the Braun Multiquick 7 Cordless hand blender and with its large chopper accessory.
asset.author: Braun

transcripts:
[MUSIC PLAYING]

Hi, I'm Marc Fosh and today we're going to be making a very very simple fresh Mango Sorbet. So here I've got just coming up to a boil some water and we're going to add to this sugar. So we're going to let that come to a boil and we're going to flavor it with a little bit of grated lime zest and also I'm going to add some fresh lime juice as well to the sugar syrup. Okay so we just let that come to a boil slowly and then we can prepare the mango. So we've just got here some mango here which we've just taken off the stones and peeled and diced. We're using the new cordless blender from Braun today. We're going to add a mango. So pour in the sugar syrup. So this is such an easy recipe to do at home. Okay so that has bought that puree together and we have this lovely mixture now ready for the sorbet -- the smell is wonderful. And we just pour it into a bowl and we need to freeze that for about four hours just so it's nicely blended and we're going to spoon it out and it's ready to eat. Okay so here we have a sorbet after 4 hours. We're ready to spoon that sorbet into our bowl. So we have a couple of spoonfuls of sorbet. You see how the texture has come together very nicely. I'm just going to garnish it with some fresh cherries. And there you have it, a simple Mango Sorbet.
